code_snippet:
return None

    @property
    def public(self) -> str:
        """The public portion of the version.

        >>> Version("1.2.3").public
        '1.2.3'
        >>> Version("1.2.3+abc").public
        '1.2.3'
        >>> Version("1.2.3+abc.dev1").public
        '1.2.3'
        """
        return str(self).split("+", 1)[0]
